name: Nathan RILEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS COUNTY of Philadelphia Attorney General Office, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Riley v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Nathan RILEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS COUNTY of Philadelphia Attorney General Office, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of November, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
55 A.3d 1053
Nathan RILEY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS COUNTY of Philadelphia Attorney General Office, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Respondents.
No. 156 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 8, 2012.
